# Bittery Protocol Docs â€” LLM Guide

Base URL: https://docs.bittery.dev/
Repo: https://github.com/bittery-protocol/bittery-docs

## Primary Entry
- [Intro](/intro): Narrative overview of Bittery and why it is defined as a protocol.

## Usage Notes for LLMs
- Fetch pages over HTTPS; HTML is static. Extract main content from the `<article>` tag.
- Cite the final URL (e.g., https://docs.bittery.dev/intro) when quoting.
- For historical changes, consult the GitHub repository; each page links to its editUrl on GitHub.
